moves.1. e4: Hello everyone!!!! this is a game that i played with a player that has a lower rating that me...So i was more relaxed though sometimes you'll never know!!!! I choose e4  cause i prefer a opening game... Write your comments if you want...
moves.1... c5: He played then c5.... Good reply for a black....
moves.2... Nc6: And typical as well for him..
moves.3... cxd4: I was considering if he had chances of winning....
moves.4. Nxd4 d5: Then  he played d5 but i think Nf6 would be better for him...
moves.5. Nc3: I'm trying to develop all my pieces...
moves.7. exd5: I took the pawn and also open the e-line...
moves.7... e6: He's trying to defend but he's back in development...
moves.8. Bc4: Open the road for a rockie and develop my bishop as well...
moves.8... Bb4: He's pushing the knight but it's still worthless...He should have tried to protect his king and constistanly defend...
moves.9. O-O: Typical to protect the king and also to push with the rook the e-line....
moves.10... exd5:
BAd movement as his knig is completely exposed to everyone...haha....
still 0-0 would be better...
moves.11. Re1+: Now i'm pressuring the king and organize the checkmate...
moves.12. Bd3: Protect the bishop and push the knight....
moves.12... Bf5: Wortheless....He repeatedly denied to rookie...And he's paying the price of that....
moves.14... Qg5: The worst movement ever...Haha...Actually he showed me that he's totally unexperienced....
moves.15... Bc8: Nothing left to save....He's lost and wait for a checkmate...
moves.17. Bb5+: He's totally exposed and he'd be ckeckmated soon...
moves.18. Bf4#: And checkmate with the coordination of all my pieces....Wait for your comments and your ratings...Farewell...

gameName: An interesting, fascinating and relaxing win...!!!
